Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2011 11:57PM dillymonster wrote: What puts you at a certain stage. The reason I ask is, back in April I had a lumpectomy tumor was 2.5 cm 3/20 were positive and they said I am 2B. I had completed TAC 6wks the end of aug. I was supposed to start rad. In sep but another lesion was found a 2nd lumpectomy done, IDC found , bi ate mast. Done in April. And will hopefully start radiation this month. Would the things that occurred following the initial surgery change my stage?
Posts.Title: to all new stage 4 members apple apple

Posts.Content: Dec 21, 2011 12:17PM dillymonster wrote: Had a CT scan today of chest abdomen and pelvis to rule out mets. I am hoping to hear by tomorrow afternoon. I had a mastectomy last month and I am supposed to start radiation after Christmas. Fingers crossed.
